headline: Accountability over Judgment
alternativeHeadline: A Discussion About How We Deal With Hate Speech
description: A Socratic dialogue between Aleksandr and ChatGPT exploring the tension between freedom of speech, moral restraint, and cultural conditioning toward outrage. Beginning with a real event at the University of Washington, the conversation unfolds into a meditation on proportionality, pedagogy, and the discipline of freedom ‚Äî culminating in the ethical axiom 'Violence is always unequal in reciprocity to words.'
